name: Contamination (ctx1000)
description:
Description

A sort of shooter developed in unity with a vast three-dimensional world and an incredible amount of places to explore. Formed by twelve main quests, including two boss fights. 

Updated continuously with new features

Commands

[H] Pause

[R] Reload

(Mouse Right) Aim

(Mouse Left) Shot

System requirements

RAM: 8GB

OS: Windows 10

Others: (tested with rtx 3050 and i7)

Disk Space: 2gb
